english: May I please ask, what is your name?
Is there someone here who speaks English?
I don't want it! (useful for people who come up trying to sell you something)
Can I make a telephone call?
Can I use your cell phone?

chinese: 半夜 bànyè or 午夜

english: It is nine in the morning.

chinese: 星期天 xīngqī tiān or xīngqī rì

english: Do you have it in another colour?
How much is a ticket to _____?
Do you go to ___(the central station)?
chinese: 去不去___(火车站)? qù bù qù ___

english: Do you have any rooms available?
Can I look at the menu, please?
Do you have an English menu?
A glass of red/white wine, please.
Do you have any bar snacks?
Do you have this in my size?
Please provide me with a carrier-bag.
I want to rent a car.

chinese: 我是 美国/澳洲/英国/加拿大 公民。

english: I want to talk to the American/Australian/British/Canadian embassy/consulate.
chinese: 我希望跟 美国/澳洲/英国/加拿大 的 大使馆/领事馆 联系。

english: I want to talk to a lawyer.
Can I just pay a fine now?
Can I make international calls here?
How much is it to America/Australia/Britain/Canada?
chinese: 打给 美国/澳洲/英国/加拿大 是多少钱?

english: Where can I find an Internet cafe?
How much is it per hour?
